data.title: Boston Athletic Association
data.text:
The Boston Athletic Association (B.A.A.) has announce members of the Bank of America Professional Athlete Team for the 128th Boston Marathon presented by Bank of America.

WOMEN (Jan. 10 release): Defending Champions Lead Historically Fast Women’s Field for 128th Boston Marathon presented by Bank of America

MEN (Jan 17 release): Boston Champions & Global Stars Set to Square Off at 128th Boston Marathon presented by Bank of America
